7/ I treasure the friendship between the United States and Colombia. I want our countries to be close. But I‚Äôm very disappointed by setbacks on issues that matter to the U.S. Congress. I‚Äôm deeply concerned about the human rights situation in Colombia.

6/ What we heard has caused me deep concern.
